resources.string:
Use "$taskLogger$" as filter in Logcat to see the output, which contains:


1) activity attributes(name, launchMode, intent flags, process info, other attributes defined in AndroidManifest) 

 2) activity lifecycle callbacks (onCreate(),onResume(), ....... ), and jumps between activities(startActivity()) 

 3) tasks and back stack status 



Try different intent flags, which can be configured in menu within Activity A, B:
 * FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK
 * FLAG_ACTIVITY_MULTIPLE_TASK
 * FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP
 * FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK
 * FLAG_ACTIVITY_SINGLE_TOP
